history.proof: intros H_sym. unfold RStep. unfold subrel. intros x y Hsub. qsimpl time: 2. apply x. apply H_sym. qsimpl time: 2.

In environment A : Type R, R' : relation A H_sym : Symmetric R x : forall x y : A, R x y -> R' x y y, Hsub : A H : R y Hsub Unable to unify "A" with "R y Hsub".

original: intros H_sym. unfold RStep. unfold subrel. intros x y Hsub. split. - intros Hxy. apply Hsub. apply H_sym. apply Hxy. - intros Hyx. apply H_sym. apply Hsub. apply Hyx.
